fiveStar.name: Nuclear Finisher
fiveStar.skill: Increase Nuclear damage by 24.2%/24.2%/31.5%/31.5%/38.8%/38.8%/46.1%. When attacking a foe with an elemental ailment, increase Attack by 30.0%/39.0%/39.0%/48.0%/48.0%/57.0%/57.0%. When an ally inflicts an elemental ailment, gain 1 Heat stack. When Crash Out is active, spend all Heat stacks to increase next Nuclear skill damage by 10.0%/13.0%/13.0%/16.0%/16.0%/19.0%/19.0% for each Heat stack, up to 60.0%/78.0%/78.0%/96.0%/96.0%/114.0%/114.0%.

fourStar.name: Omega Knuckle
fourStar.skill: Increase Attack by 12.0%/12.0%/16.0%/16.0%/20.0%/20.0%/24.0%. When dealing Nuclear damage, increase damage by 4.4%/5.6%/5.6%/6.8%/6.8%/8.0%/8.0% for each Tenacity stack gained.
